H0.text: Where is the administrative centre of Cumbria. Penrith

H1.text: Where is the administrative centre of Cumbria. Kendal

H2.text: Where is the administrative centre of Cumbria. Whitehaven

H3.text: Where is the administrative centre of Cumbria. Carlisle

A4.text: The council is based in Carlisle, with its offices including Carlisle Civic Centre and Cumbria House.

A5.text: The council moved its headquarters to the new Civic Centre on Rickergate in 1964.
